website_summaries.verdict: Steve Madden pulls out another easy-to-wear yet extremely stylish kick from its platform lineup, the Steve Madden Gills. The broad variety of designs available which come at a very affordable cost was a carrot for many buyers wanting an easy-to-wear yet voguish looking slip-on. Whether you pick a suede or leather makeup, the Steve Madden Gills sneaker grants sufficient cushioning for optimum coziness. This sneaker is worthy of serious consideration as you can bag it up for a budget-friendly deal.
pros: A considerable sum of reviewers mentioned that the Steve Madden Gills fashion sneakers are perfectly sized
A reviewer who gets blisters easily with other sneakers said this shoe wasn’t uncomfortable at all
The suede quality is adored by many
It didn’t cause any blisters even during break-in time, as declared by several users who use this shoe several times a week
A lot of reviewers gorged on the fact that this slip-on comes in several on-trend variations
Some of those who were enamored by its platform built went for a second pair in a different design
Many who liked the look of this shoe which appears fantastic with lots of casual wear, recommended it to other potential users
A significant sum of wearers gave this shoe a high score due to the amazing comfort it offers
Its slip-on style offers the ease of putting it on and off, as mentioned in most reviews
Detailed by pleased buyers, this grab-and-go type of kick looks simple yet chic and smart
cons: At least one user reported that the leather-covered variation of the Steve Madden Gills cracked after a couple of uses
Very few from heaps of reviews stated that the seams started to split into the sides
The lining tends to make the feet sweaty that some advised wearing footsies or no-show socks
Some would have preferred a more breathable material like canvas

customer_reviews.title: Vans-like fit cute enough for work
customer_reviews.text: I could have went a size smaller but all and all love these shoes. They are a suede vans-like style and perfect for days I don’t feel like wearing heels to work and still look dressy enough for work.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Tongue of shoe rubs feet
customer_reviews.text: The pros are that this shoe is super cute and fits decently (length and width). I did have to size down half a size (from 6.5 to 6). However it has so many cons. It is so uncomfortable! The tongue is so long at the top, and because the shoe is made of a stiff suede leather, it rubs the top of your feet! Obviously the heel is also stiff at first, but that's not a big deal (you can use heel inserts). The deal breaker was the long tongue rubbing constantly against the top of your feet. Most no show socks won't be able to cover your feet that far. Such a bummer :(
customer_reviews.author: Chibi

customer_reviews.title: No heel blistering with all-day wear!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! Requires no break-in time...super comfortable. On my first wear, I wore them on vacation walking for a whole day. No heel issues as it is padded and rounded... Love that they thought about this. I recommend wearing footies to keep feet from sweating. The grey color is a great neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Clareaq

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoes-
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - i purchased them in 3 colors. I have lupus so wanted cute shoes to slide on and off plus cute and these fit the bill. Little snug when first buy but they lossen up after wear - love them
customer_reviews.author: yellowlablover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought my normal sneaker size of 8, I’m a 7.5 in sandals. These are the ultimate slip on sneaker!! Second pair only because I lost one pair, they hold up very well! I’ve worn them a ton. Easy to get on and off. I wear without socks and my feet temperature stays pretty regulated, not too hot or cold. I had a pair of the expensive Vince ones (if you’re debating about getting those) and much prefer these ones to those! I hope they continue to carry these!
customer_reviews.author: NatalieB_Well

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM. I usually wear and 8.5 or sometimes 9.. went with rose gold in 8.5 and they are the best. My comfiest sneakers and I get so many compliments on them. Also, I was concerned about creasing on the top with this color but so far so good after like 15 wears. They’ll end up with creases eventually but def held up longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size worn without socks / anklets.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 9 which is my normal size and they fit fine without any socks, etc. but there does seem to be enough room should you want to wear a thin low-cut one. These are very sharp looking and have a bit of an elevated heel all the way around—wouldn’t go as far as to say platform but because of the lift they are very comfy. They are a black suede velvet material and worked well into the fall, winter and early spring. I wear my black canvas Vans like this style in summer months though. You can get away with wearing them with just about anything — dress up or down — buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: EJane

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing... Im in love
customer_reviews.text: These shoes in size 8 fit me perfectly, I absolutely love them. I was a bit worried with sizing im usually a 7.5 or 8. Would definitely purchase another pair. Super cute color.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Downs

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE & LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes!! So comfy and flattering. Hope Madden continues making this style. I am almost tempted to buy another pair so I will always have them. Great looking suede sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: MGG

customer_reviews.title: Once it's on it's fine if a little tight
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in my normal size 6 and they were sooooo freaking tight around the heel I had to bend and try to stretch to loosen up the material before I could even slip my heel in. Once it's on it's fine if a little tight, but since there is no give or stretch to the material it's a huge pain to squeeze your foot in before they're broken in. Def order a size up
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: these are very cute and comfy. I wore them to work and got a lot of compliments, they are worth every penny. When I first wore them, I thought they were gonna be hard to wear, but after breaking them in, they are extremely comfortable and practical. They go with any outfit, I'm gonna get a second pair in a different color. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Item
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this same shoe in-store. The weight of this sneaker is too low to be genuine. When I picked up the box, I couldn’t believe there were shoes inside, it was that light. As soon as you touch these shoes, you can feel the poor quality. I firmly believe this is a knock-off, and I’m sending them back without ever trying them on. Don’t waste your money, these are garbage shoes that won’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Suuuuper stiff and uncomfortable. The tongue comes up just ...
customer_reviews.text: Suuuuper stiff and uncomfortable. The tongue comes up just high enough to stab you in the tendons. The whole shoe is very hard. DEFINITELY not worth almost $80. Returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: r. Britain

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but the top part that hits your heel is brutal. I’ve had these shoes for a few weeks and every time I wear them my heels are torn up. Even with bandaids. I’ve tried breaking them in but it’s not getting any better. I’d suggest trying some in person before committing to these online.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Liked the look a lot. Sadly sizes didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to keep these. But the size 7 was too tight & the size 7.5 slipped around on my heel. My shoe size usually runs normal width in a 7, 7.5, sometimes 8 depending on the shoe. But I had bought the smooth white leather ones in a 7.5 & they fit ok. Much better after worn around the house a few times. But these suede ones just had a slightly different fit that didn’t work in either size. I ended up exchanging for the black smooth leather croc print. But I liked the look of the suede much better.
customer_reviews.author: Truly Julie

customer_reviews.title: Lovelovelovelove
customer_reviews.text: These are EXACTLY what I wanted and they are very attractive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but all of the Steve Madden shoes I've gotten lately have been so uncomfortable. I could tell as soon as I put them on that they would give me terrible blisters even after breaking in. It sucks because Steve Madden is supposed to be a shoe company, so you would think comfort would be a top priority. But like I said, so many of their shoes I've tried are really uncomfortable. They're cute and look like the picture, but definitely not cute enough to suffer all the blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Super CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern of these SO MUCH!!!! I have them in all black and wore them with EVERYTHING so wanted another pair but in a different color...These snake print ones are AMAZING! I wear a size 6.5-7 depending on the shoe and the 7s in this brand are the perfect fit. Any smaller and they'd be uncomfortable. They were out of stock everywhere so I finally found them on Amazon. Quick delivery, but not the 2-day prime, had to wait a couple extra days... well worth the wait love, love, LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystee A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I love the pattern and they are very comfortable. A little tough to put on at first only because they were brand new. I don't have any problems now. They are true to size. I wear a 6.5 and ordered a 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Viator

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not all that comfortable. They feel rough and tight on the sides ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not all that comfortable. They feel rough and tight on the sides so I find myself avoiding them but maybe if I wore them more they would get better. I ordered up 1/2 size to a 7 and I swear they make my feet look big.
customer_reviews.author: jen3

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: These slip on sneakers are a bit pricy but I do like them. They're comfortable and have pretty good support. Not crazy about the suede but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Sholden7

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!!  heavy heavy shoes
customer_reviews.text: They were heavy, stiff and very uncomfortable, very disappointed , I am returning them!!
customer_reviews.author: rockingrandma

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes! A little tighter than maddens without platform
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Steve Madden shoes for work and travel. This is the first pair I’ve bought with a bit of a platform. I think they’re super cute but they do fit a bit tighter than the version without the platform. They’re a little tight on the top of my foot. I think if I continue to wear them they’ll stretch out. I still really like them and think they’re cuter than the shoes without the lift, they’re just a little less comfortable. I’m hoping they break in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacation Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: I got these before going on a vacation abroad for which I could only take one bag. These were my only shoes the entire trip, and I wore them for long sightseeing tours as well as night events. The funky rose gold color added some interest to my neutral, minimal one-bag travel wardrobe and make the shoes passable for even a visit to a concert hall. Would easily buy again. I've worn them so much now over the year they look more than well loved. I need a new pair!
customer_reviews.author: HoundMama

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Been looking for a new pair for ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! Love them! Been looking for a new pair for awhile, I have ordered and returned a few because they were too tight or not what I was looking for. Truly the best fit and look!
customer_reviews.author: S. Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Between sizes
customer_reviews.text: I normally take a 6.5 in shoes and a 6 in sandals. And my feet are a half-size different between the two. My feet are a little narrow but not enough for a narrow size. I ordered a 6.5 and they felt too small, my right (larger) foot toenail touched the end - or maybe the top in hindsight. I reordered a 7 and they were way too big, I walked right out of them. These are absolutely adorable, wish they would have worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: TDub

customer_reviews.title: Great online purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I’m picky when it comes to shoes, so I am not an easy pushover nor am I impressed to easily with any product. But after wearing the shoes for a couple of weeks and not getting blisters or Achilles rubbing, I have to say that this product is worth the online purchase. Sometimes when you’re purchasing shoes online it’s a big gulp because you don’t know if are they going to fit right. But if you read the shoe fitting guide and you are honest about your shoe size, you will definitely be happy with this online purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MeriO

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love these Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law requested these shoes for her Christmas Gift... I purchased through Amazon and they arrived on-time . She absolutely adores these shoes and hopes to add to her color collection. She is a working Professional but wanted something she could wear on casual days and these shoes were the item that worked best for her. Fit well and she has told me that she can wear all day with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lvonne Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Try suede ones 1st.
customer_reviews.text: I like the big bulky shoe they are kinda heavy, bit stiff and I still haven't got them broke in. Can't where them very long they do hurt my feet need no show thin socks that helps. Love the look tho. I ordered a 6 I'm usually a 6.5. I don't think a narrow foot would work in these seems to be roomy for those of us with a slightly wider foot. Just stiff is all I can really say I'm not liking about them. I did not get the suede ones they might be much better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Doehring

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as to whether or not the pink would be too pink or if the platform would be too obvious and look weird --- these are not too pink (subtle, soft pink) and the platform is just perfect. I wear these for work and love them. I accidentally scuffed the suede but it was easy to clean off. Probably will be buying these in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Claire J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual office wear
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. Have stretched a bit with wear to make it more comfortable, since Steve Madden shoes tend to be a bit narrow. Have worn both dressed up and down for office days (jeans and ankle length slacks. These replaced my Tom’s Avalon’s and am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Brookenstein

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable simple shoe
customer_reviews.text: I found that these shoes fit true to size. I ordered my normal size and they fit comfortably. They are not too narrow and not too wide. They are super comfortable too. There is a ton of cushion when I walk and the back does not rub my heel like other shoes I've had similar to these.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Poor material
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Crease in top developed just when walking around trying on
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but require a break-in period
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are adorable and comfy. I did get blisters the first time I wore them without socks. But that was my fault, I should've known better than to not break them in without socks! I get many compliments when I wear them and they are very well made. I wear an 8, so I bought an 8. They required a break in period of a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Woodadawg

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet a lot at work and at 72 years of age I need good footwear. These slip on sneakers are not only very attractive but very comfortable. They slip on and off easily and support my feet well. I also have received multiple compliments on how attractive they are. I bought the black sneakers with white soles. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They are true to size to me. The gray color is beautiful. They look stylish with many outfits. But oh my, are they uncomfortable! They hurt my toes every time I wear them, every single toe. I kept wearing them to see if they would get better but nope. Sorry I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: LeMarq

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes, super stylish, look good with skirts, better than running shoes, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A bit narrow for wide feet, but there are stretch panels on the sides that expand when you step. The fabric is subtle, satiny, and gorgeous. These are structured in the heel and made my PF heel pain completely disappear. A great comfy shoe to slip on in the mornings while I am running around the house, and more support than slippers. Love these, would by them again.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & have contemporary styling!
customer_reviews.text: I already knew I loved these shoes, so I bought another pair. They are very comfortable & have contemporary styling. I wear a size 5 1/2 to 6. I bought the 6. The 6 is perfect but I do wear an insert that’s used for my high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but for wide feet order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of these shoes but my initial purchase of my size 10 was way too small. I could not even get my feet in. I tried size 11 instead and they fit pretty well. The first time I wore them, they hurt the back of my feet, but I guess I managed to stretch them out that day because the second time I wore them they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: A Girl's Review

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky and pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought my normal size 7, I have narrow feet. Feels slightly tight, but not uncomfortable. I feel like they will loosen up . The color is nice to match with everything. This color was cheaper than all the others , don’t know why, good for fall time too. I wear the thin slip on socks with them. I would say if you have long toes and wider feet, size up half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!! Have to break in though..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute!! The first couple of times I wore them, the back of my heel was raw. However after a few wears that has stopped. I wear no show socks with them and they work well, couldn’t wear them without socks. One other thing is they stain easily but I mean they are suede so that is to be expected. They are comfy & go great with pretty much any outfit. They’re really my go to shoe if I’m wearing a t shirt or even a dressier shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Was on the search for snakeskin slip ons for months. These are perfect. They are stiff as mentioned but I had no troubles wearing them (no rubbing or blisters). They feel well made. The platform is a nice touch and the colors are great! Very happy with my purchase! Ordered 8.5 true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not real Steve Madden
customer_reviews.text: My roommate used to have these shoes and I wore them ALL the time, so I’m used to how the shoe fits and how they feel, at first glance they look very similar to the REAL Steve Madden Gill slip ons, however after further inspection after looking at the closely and feeling the inside and outside of the shoe these are definitely fake Steve Maddens. So if you’re going to buy them just save the wait from the shipping and buy them in the store instead! The real ones are the same price and they’re more comfy and they’re REAL!
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these shoes. But I knew they were gonna be uncomfortable as soon as I felt the opening of the shoes. Very stiff and not smooth. I really wanted to like these shoes. I'd rather have less stylish shoes but comfortable shoes. So I'm sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Blue bear

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first pair because they were cutting into my heel, and I thought since they were a tad big, that was the reason. I ordered a second pair, which fit, but again, cut into my heel and I had to return those as well (rubbing/blisters). Bummer, because they’re adorable.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Lost trust in this seller
customer_reviews.text: Received the item and the shoes were dirty underneath and looked like they had been worn. I contacted the seller and they sent me a new pair and I sent back the first pair. Well I just received the new pair today and they look worse than the first pair I bought. I’m so incredibly frustrated and I feel like this has been a waste of my time and money. Do not trust this seller
customer_reviews.author: Kim Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Right size is tiny but snug but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are very stylish! I love the rich genuine suede. I purchased 8.5 which is my normal size- these are just a tiny bit snug but I am hoping with wear, they will be just right. I tried these on in the store and I know a half size bigger would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Feminine Power

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received these shoes. The bottoms were dirty as well as the sides of the shoes as if they’d been worn before. For the price I paid for these, I expected to get a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes but haven’t held up.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes but after wearing them only about 3 times, the sole separated from the shoe. Once I realized it, it was too late to return/exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff  bad copy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a Steve Madden knock off, inside on the in sole should be a sewn label saying Steve Madden , something has been scraped off and is sticky on my heel when I wear them, also the size should be labeled on the top of the shoe, these are not good also runs a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes will stretch out, order a smaller size!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes but they stretched after a couple of days wear. I normally wear a 5 but they seemed too tight and sent them back and ordered a 5.5. They slide off my heel now. So, I’m giving them away because the size I need is no longer available. 🙁 It’s a really super cute shoe but order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: John West

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 5 and that is the size I needed in the Steve Madden gills. They are a comfortable but need to be broken in. I couldn't decide between the black suede or black leather but I finally decided on the leather and I"m glad I did. Trying to decide if I want now buy them in another color. Love the platform. Overall very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Really cute. I'm a 7, ordered a 7, but they are a littttle loose. I have a narrow heel, so I know that is the issue, not the shoe. So if you have a narrow heel, don't expect them to be snug! I wouldn't size down, however. They are still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: How they fit
customer_reviews.text: I like them but they are little larger than the ones I bought before even though they are both the same size.
customer_reviews.author: jamie fender

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fashionable, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! I have them in so many colors. Sizing is dead on for every color I buy. Cute, fashionable, and comfortable! Still wearing pairs I bought two years ago! They look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. True to size
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable!!! Great shoes to run arruine in all day!!! Put them to a yet with two under two and I love them. Do need a little breaking in. Otherwise your heel will hurt. At least for the first couple of wears otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: a little small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9.5 and had to go up to a 10. These are really cute and I love the little platform, but the leather is hard and my feet do not go "ahhh" when I put them on. Good for little outings, not long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Quickwilber

customer_reviews.title: True to size but squeaky heels
customer_reviews.text: Typically Steve Madden shoes run a little bit small. I’m a 6.5 and always have to order a 7 in their shoes. However these are true to size. The heel does squeak though which is why I didn’t give them a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blisters and bad quality-
customer_reviews.text: Steve Madden is notorious for making bad shoes. Idk why I bought these. I guess I was thing maybe the quality would have changed Nothing has changed in years! Ugh. If you want your feel to hurt and blisters.. these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: M E

customer_reviews.title: DO not buy, they are fake
customer_reviews.text: They are FAKE! Says made in mexico when the real ones are made in China. I have a pair in black already from DSW. You need to advertise these are a dupe and not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WTF
customer_reviews.text: SO I purchased these shoes October 31st and have worn them approximately once a week. It’s pretty cold in Chicago right now and I walked about .5 miles to get groceries. I’m crossing the street IN THE COLD WITH GROCERIES AND THE FREAKING BOTTOM OF THIS SHOES JUST COMES OFF?! Not a little bit the WHOLE THING. I’m sure this was a very amusing sight to see but I do not recommend. I have had shoes for years and this never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. The color is very nice. I expected a platform heel but it is just a regular sole. I wear a 10 but these are just barely long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: If I could return these worn (like at Nordstrom), I would. I have the snakeskin print and they are so cute but that’s about it. The top of the shoe comes up too high and rubs at the top of my foot/ankle. I actually have a purple bruise/callous forming where these shoes rub. I have a narrow foot size 8.5 so I can’t imagine anyone else being able to wear these without being in pain.
customer_reviews.author: hmtx85

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers in October and now, not even six months later, they are beginning to come apart. For an $80 shoe I find this extremely disappointing. The fabric is tearing away from the rubber seam above the platform and the inner sole of the shoe is beginning to come apart. I am extremely disappointed in the quality of this shoe especially since I love the pattern so much. I will NOT be buying another pair of Steve Madden shoes. They are overpriced and low-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are a great casual shoe with a camo print that almost reads black. They pair back to a lot of outfits and are comfortable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I had these maddens for years I replaced them several times but the style changed and they are nowhere near as comfortable as they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Slightly big but just a tiny bit. A smaller size might of been too small. Nice color too. I just ordered it in another color too.
customer_reviews.author: loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Very nice and comfortable to wear on short walks. Don’t wear right away on long walks as you may end up with blisters. I gave 4 stars because that’s what happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Bruised my toe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit, but my foot kept slipping and within twenty minutes my toe was bruised. That has never happened with any shoe I have ever worn
customer_reviews.author: M Martel

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I got the shoes in "white leather" and while they fit perfect and are comfortable, the shade of white does not look the same as pictured. It's almost like an off white/ivory. Little disappointing. The platform also is not as thick as it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color -
customer_reviews.text: beautiful shoes and i love the color . I bought 7 because that is my size but they were big. I should order 6 and half. Unfortanately price went up so i kept the shoes and gave they to my sister which she is size 7 and half and fit her perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Evel14

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. Was worried they’d be stiff and not bend well bc they are a thick sole, but no issue at all. Surprisingly comfortable. Very true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Appleseed

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe .. but way too wide.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work .. these run large, especially wide.. Length appeared to be true to size, however they flopped around since they felt so wide. Love the style though!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer White

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these sneakers but they did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these sneakers but they did not fit. I walked right out of the sneakers. Besides being too long, the heel was too wide. I ordered my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Silver

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes! They are a little bit tight but with this type of shoes over the time it expand and get very loose. I love the color
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Break them in
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I own a lot of Steve Madden, but this ones are my favorite. The color goes with everything. Truth to the size. You just need to break them in. Suggested To put socks for two days inside to stretch them out. If you don’t have a stretcher. Other than that you’ll get compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Comfort depends on your foot
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch/instep and this is a bit tight and uncomfortable through there. Probably great on a normal foot. Besides that, cute sturdy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, but not padded or flexible like a running shoe would be
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. I went up a size. Also very flat. Lacks the arch support of a running shoe. It is also stiffer, less flexible for walking than a running shoe. This shoe is more for style than comfort.
customer_reviews.author: HerbSack

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too tight
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking shoes and I really wanted to like them, but they are so tight in the toebox, not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P.

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: There is no arch support. Wore just a couple of hours and had to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Hupperich

customer_reviews.title: Fit AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Fit perfect. I usually wear an 8.5-9 and I bought a 9. They aren't floppy or oversized. Very nice shoes. Suede is very nice! I am so excited!
customer_reviews.author: lisamc13

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not a lot of support
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these to arrive. They are super cute and you can dress them up or down. I have flat feet (no arch whatsoever, but these don't leave a huge gap like some other shoes) and there's not a lot of support. The shoes themselves are pretty stiff. Definitely a fashion shoe, not really for walking a ton. But overall, I really love them!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not for thin, bony feet!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these. They do look like the pictures, but to me they were too thick and heavy, I have thin bones and it just makes my feet look huge. Women with more more toned legs might enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Cute and versatile sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These are just fun! I bought the snakeskin print and so far I've enjoyed having them. I would say they are TTS. Cute sneaker to wear with casual outfits this fall and winter. I'm not sure how long the snakeskin will be in style, but for now they are spot on trend!
customer_reviews.author: Arnolds

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable. I use them for work and I work on my feet so they definitely help relieve some pain. But I have only had them for about 2 and a half months and the inside sole is wearing down slightly, but it’s understandable because I use them heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Stith

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great. Had to return my first pair purchased and get half size larger as first shoes were smaller and more narrow than most my normal size. The half size did it...they fit perfectly now.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Man

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: this Slip on shoe is the best I have ever owned. I have purchased from this designer before and have never been disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best. Shoes. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best shoe. I have it in several colors. I am a teacher and these are cute enough to be worn daily with my business casual. They are so comfortable! A bit snug the first time you try them on, but adjust within a few hours to fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Simpson

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the shoes in a 9 which is my usual size and they were so small I couldn't get my foot in, I then reordered in a size 10 and they fit for about the first 3 time I wore them, and now they are too big. I guess they stretch out very easily. Very disappointed since now that I have worn them like five times I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Down size they stretch a lot after a couple is uses :(
customer_reviews.text: This shoes stretch out a lot. I only wore them a couple of times. Now they are too big and can’t wear them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for work/ school. At first I thought I was gonna have to return them as they felt a little tight (I have wide feet) and I know Steve Madden runs a little small. I ordered my normal size and after a few days of wear, they have stretched out perfectly and are super comfy. Definitely recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nidia C.

customer_reviews.title: I will return and buy from another brand
customer_reviews.text: Shoes seem used. Stains on the white sole, suede is also dirty. The form is odd, wider at the tip and thinner around your ankles. It has a weird curve to it. I suspect they may not be originals, the logo on the back is crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Q

customer_reviews.title: Love the platform height
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. I ordered a size 9 in black and it fits perfectly. My foot isn’t wide so there’s no issue there. Looks exactly as pictured and feels great on. I get a lot of compliments on them and they go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. To me it’s not the most comfortable shoe but it very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie Haas

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and love the height
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and love the height, but I wear an eight and without laces and socks this fit is a little big! I'm going to exchange for the 7 1/2 and hope it's not too tight!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn  Easton

customer_reviews.title: Love them even more than expected
customer_reviews.text: My best friend recommended these and they're terrific. Very comfy, true to size, and look fab! The shoes and I are on our way to Europe and plan on doing lots of walking!
customer_reviews.author: MNV

customer_reviews.title: Compliments for days!
customer_reviews.text: Every single time I wear them, I get compliments. NO lie!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. So comfortable. I usually agree a 5 1/2 but returned for a 5. Perfect. They are my go to shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Winkler

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these just couldn’t justify the price so i had to return them but I’m asking for them for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but needs arch support
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add a arch support, but other than that, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: EllenG

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Gills Sneaker
product_meta.description: We've elevated our classic slip-on sneaker this season, adding a platform sole and a variety of luxurious surfaces for a look that’s chicly refined.
feature_bullets: Suede, leather, or man-made upper material
